dcterms:creator: Q. Li
B. Yu
X. Tian
dcterms:description: Dradio contains 2,799 CT-scans of patients in portal venous phase with a radiological (weak) annotation indicating four different stages of cirrhosis: no cirrhosis, mild cirrhosis, moderate cirrhosis, and severe cirrhosis.
dcterms:title: Dradio

dcterms:description: D1 histo contains 106 CT-scans from different patients in portal venous phase, with an identified histopathological status (METAVIR score) obtained by histological analysis, designated as y1_histo.
dcterms:title: D1 histo

dcterms:creator: B.J. Erickson
S. Kirk
Lee
dcterms:description: D2 histo is the public LIHC dataset from the Cancer Genome Atlas, which presents a histological score, the Ishak score, designated as y2_histo.
dcterms:title: D2 histo (LIHC dataset)
